text: 5.21: Ais 53.6-12; Zo 8.46; Ro 5.19; 1 Ko 1.30; Ga 3.13; Fi 3.9; Hi 4.14-15; 1 Pi 2.22-24; 1 Zo 3.5Krais, ana guigira tɨva mbatɨk thueŋ muuŋgi fhuvara. Zakɨra fhuvara! Fhe Bakɨme nzan kurkurar zav, ana nza muuŋgi tɨvi mbatɨgi, ana za nta ndiav, ana kɨrar mbarigim, Krais ana guigira tɨvi mbatɨgi ga mbui guman fara muuŋgi. Fhe Bakɨme maaŋ muuŋgirim, nza Krais phorgɨp kɨv, nza ana ŋkasŋkar panan, nza Fhe Bakɨmen tɨvir vhuuiaŋ mbui gumgi gu mbigir kɨrga.
